languages.text: "Ты сделал{mf||а} что-то, чего мы не поняли. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}Пронзил{mf||а}{/d} одного сервитора осколком темного света. Мы не чувствовали ничего похожего никогда. Боль. Смерть вместилищ. И темный свет — он все время где-то рядом, хочет прийти и быть, даже когда другие не будут. И ты рад{mf||а} его присутствию".

traits.locale_text: "Ты сделал{mf||а} что-то, чего мы не поняли. Пронзил{mf||а} одного сервитора осколком большого мучительного голода. Мы не чувствовали ничего похожего никогда. Боль. Смерть вместилищ. Что это было и зачем ты сделал{mf||а} это?"

languages.text: "You did something we could not understand. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}pierced{/d} one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."
languages.original_text: "Ты сделал{mf||а} что-то, чего мы не поняли. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}Пронзил{mf||а}{/d} одного сервитора осколком темного света. Мы не чувствовали ничего похожего никогда. Боль. Смерть вместилищ. И темный свет — он все время где-то рядом, хочет прийти и быть, даже когда другие не будут. И ты рад{mf||а} его присутствию".

traits.locale_text: "You did something we could not understand. You pierced one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

"You did something we could not understand. You pierced one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it will make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

"You did something we could not understand. You pierced one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

"You did something we could not understand. You pierced one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

"You did something we could not understand. You pierced one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

"You did something we could not understand. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}pierced{/d} one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

languages.text: « Vous avez fait quelque chose que nous ne pouvions comprendre. Vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}frappé{/d} l'un des servitors d'un éclat de lumière sombre. Nous n'avions jamais ressenti une chose pareille. La douleur. La mort des réceptacles. La lumière sombre reste proche, elle veut venir, elle veut exister. Même au prix de l'existence des autres. Et sa présence vous réjouit. »
languages.original_text: "You did something we could not understand. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}pierced{/d} one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez fait quelque chose que nous ne pouvions comprendre. Vous avez frappé l'un des servitors d'un éclat de lumière sombre. Nous n'avions jamais ressenti une chose pareille. Douleur. la mort des réceptacles. La lumière sombre reste proche, elle veut venir, elle veut exister. Même au prix de l'existence des autres. Et sa présence vous réjouit. »

languages.text: “你做了一件我们无法理解的事情。你用闪着黑暗之光的碎片{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}刺穿{/d}了一个机仆。我们从未有过那样的感觉。疼痛，容器的死亡，而那黑暗之光……它总是徘徊在附近。它想要进来，想要存在，即使这样会使别人的存在停止。而且，你对它的存在感到兴奋。”
languages.original_text: "You did something we could not understand. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}pierced{/d} one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

traits.locale_text: “你做了一件我们无法理解的事情。你用闪着黑暗之光的碎片刺穿了一个奴工。我们从未有过那样的感觉。疼痛，容器的死亡，而那黑暗之光……它总是徘徊在附近。它想要进来，想要存在，即使这样会使别人的存在停止。而且，你对它的存在感到兴奋。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt etwas getan, was wir nicht verstehen konnten. Ihr habt einen der Servitoren mit einem Splitter des dunklen Lichts {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}durchbohrt{/d}. Wir hatten so etwas noch nie gespürt. Schmerz. Den Tod der Behältnisse. Und das dunkle Licht – es ist immer in der Nähe, es will kommen und sein, auch wenn es das Sein anderer dadurch beenden würde. Und seine Anwesenheit erregt Euch."
languages.original_text: "You did something we could not understand. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}pierced{/d} one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt etwas getan, was wir nicht verstehen konnten. Ihr habt einen der Servitoren mit einem Splitter des dunklen Lichts durchbohrt. Wir hatten so etwas noch nie gespürt. Schmerz. Den Tod der Behältnisse. Und das dunkle Licht — es ist immer in der Nähe, es will kommen und sein, auch wenn es das Sein anderer dadurch beenden würde. Und seine Anwesenheit erregt Euch."

languages.text: «Hiciste algo que no entendimos. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}Perforaste{/d} uno de los servidores con un fragmento de luz oscura. Nunca hemos sentido algo así. Dolor. Las muertes de los receptáculos. Y la luz oscura, que siempre está cerca, quiere venir y ser, aunque haga que otros dejen de ser. Y a ti te emociona su presencia».
languages.original_text: "You did something we could not understand. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}pierced{/d} one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

traits.locale_text: «Hiciste algo que no entendimos Perforaste uno de los servidores con un fragmento de luz oscura. Nunca hemos sentido algo así. Dolor. Las muertes de los receptáculos. Y la luz oscura, que siempre está cerca, quiere venir y ser, aunque haga que otros dejen de ser. Y a ti te emociona su presencia».

languages.text: 「あなたは我々には理解できないことをした。闇の光の破片でサーヴィターのひとりを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}貫いた{/d}。我々はその時の衝動を感じたことがなかった。痛み。器の死。そして、闇の光は…常に近くにあり、他者を消滅させることになろうとも、自由に現れることを望んでいる。そして、あなたはその存在に高揚していた」
languages.original_text: "You did something we could not understand. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}pierced{/d} one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは我々には理解できないことをした。闇の光の破片でサーヴィターのひとりを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}貫いた{/d}。我々はその時の衝動を感じたことがなかった。痛み。器の死。そして、闇の光は…常に近くにあり、他者を消滅させることになろうとも、自由に現れることを望んでいる。そして、あなたはその存在に高揚していた」

languages.text: "Anlayamadığımız bir şey yaptınız. Hizmetörlerden birini, karanlık ışığın bir parçasıyla {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}delip geçtiniz{/d}. Daha önce hiç böyle bir şey hissetmemiştik. Acı... Muhafazaların ölümü... Karanlık ışık... O hep yakındır, başkalarının yok olmasına neden olacaksa da gelmek ve olmak ister. Varlığından haz alıyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "You did something we could not understand. You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StrangeServitorsCorrupted}pierced{/d} one of the servitors with a shard of the dark light. We had never felt anything like it. Pain. The deaths of the receptacles. And the dark light — it is always near, it wants to come and be, even though it would make others cease to be. And you are excited by its presence."

traits.locale_text: "Anlayamadığımız bir şey yaptınız. Servitörlerden birini, karanlık ışığın bir parçasıyla delip geçtiniz. Daha önce hiç böyle bir şey hissetmemiştik. Acı... Muhafazaların ölümü... Karanlık ışık... O hep yakındır, başkalarının yok olmasına neden olacaksa da gelmek ve olmak ister. Varlığından haz alıyorsunuz."
